name: Girl In City (v0.1)
description:
Beautiful alien girl comes to this planet called earth to innocently causes havoc to the inhabitants. Any resistance is futile!

Version 0.1.1
- Fix hand display overlapping.
- Fix seeing below the terrain.
- Fix car floating in the air.

//***************************
Version 0.1.0 - Real Mega footprints (Real-time Terrain Modification)
- A different city each round you play. (Procedural Generation)
- Tiny civilian vehicles in the panic - Can you find and crush them all?
- Mega destruction to the entire city.

DeviantART: https://www.deviantart.com/clivic/art/Girl-In-City-v0-1-779804600

Models used:
Query Chan,
Simple Game-Ready Car set,

19 low-poly buildings
